The Vijay Muhurat is deemed the most favorable moment on Dussehra, believed to bring success to endeavors started during this period. Historically, it marked the time when kings launched military campaigns. Nowadays, individuals perform Shami Puja, inaugurate businesses, or invest in vehicles and property during this auspicious phase.
Timings are derived from standard Panchang calculations and might differ slightly depending on your location and regional calendar. For exact details, consult a local priest or astrologer.
